name: cordova-app-loader
description: Cordova App Loader - remote update your cordova app

scripts.cordova-promise-fs: npm run-script cordova-promise-fs prepublish && cp node_modules/cordova-file-cache/node_modules/cordova-promise-fs/dist/CordovaPromiseFS.js www/lib/CordovaPromiseFS.js
scripts.copy-tests: cp pegasus.js www/test/pegasus.js && cp node_modules/cordova-promise-fs/test/tests.js www/test/cordova-promise-fs-tests.js && cp node_modules/cordova-file-cache/test/tests.js www/test/cordova-file-cache-tests.js
scripts.bundle: webpack bundle.js dist/cordova-app-loader-complete.js && cp dist/cordova-app-loader-complete.js www/lib/cordova-app-loader-complete.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run copy-tests && npm run autoupdate && npm run bootstrap && npm run cordova-app-loader && npm run copy-to-dist && npm run bundle && npm run minify-dist
scripts.copy-to-dist: cp www/lib/CordovaAppLoader.js dist/ && cp www/lib/CordovaPromiseFS.js dist/ && cp www/bootstrap.js dist/ && cp www/autoupdate.js dist/
scripts.minify-dist: uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 dist/bootstrap.js -o dist/bootstrap.min.js && uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 dist/autoupdate.js -o dist/autoupdate.min.js && uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 dist/CordovaPromiseFS.js -o dist/CordovaPromiseFS.min.js && uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 dist/CordovaAppLoader.js -o dist/CordovaAppLoader.min.js && uglifyjs -c -m --screw-ie8 dist/cordova-app-loader-complete.js > dist/cordova-app-loader-complete.min.js

author: Mark Marijnissen
